name: Orber (Legacy)
description:
(Originally published in July 2018)

A simple arcade-style game where your main objective is to get the highest score you can! Although it's not as easy as it seems, as touching anything can result with your death.

There's a couple gameplay mechanics you should know:

The Square: Follows player, and randomly drops an orb.

The Circle: Bounces around the screen like a ping pong ball. Gets faster with time, and detonates orbs when it touches them.

Making both enemies collide will increase gradually increase your multiplier and change The Circle's direction, thus allowing it to hit more orbs- so more points for you!
